titleInfo.title: Have surrendered themselves to the City Police Jail.

mods.abstract: HAVE surrendered themselves to the City Police Jail, on the 15th inst., the negro boy Davy, and his wife Suzanne, with her child Augusta, infant seven months old. Davy is about 30 years old and five feet six inches high. Suzanne is about twenty-two years old, 5 feet 6 1/2 inches high. Says they belonged to Mr. Charles Baily, living in the Parish of Plaquemine. The owner is requested to call and claim said slaves according to law. to law. E. PLANCHARD, Keeper City Police Jail. New Orleans, August 21, 1855. au21 15t
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
